title: Labor Day, Cowboys injuries, Coach of the Year, Rookie of the Year Predictions, Josh Allen vs. Ben Roethlisberger, Greatest Week 1 Moments
itunes:title: Labor Day, Cowboys injuries, Coach of the Year, Rookie of the Year Predictions, Josh Allen vs. Ben Roethlisberger, Greatest Week 1 Moments
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast on Labor Day, hosts Kay Adams, Michael Robinson Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt discuss the latest news ahead of the Dallas Cowboys and Tampa Bay Buccaneers kickoff opener including the status of quarterback Dak Prescott and offensive lineman Zack Martin. Kay, Mike Rob, Peter and Kyle also lead off prediction week with their biggest predictions of the 2021 season, including Coach of the Year, Rookie of the Year, NFC leading rushers, sack duos and more. The crew previews the biggest matchups for Week 1 including the quarterback duel between Pittsburgh Steelers veteran Ben Roethlisberger and the Buffalo Bills young gun Josh Allen. The hosts tackle a range of topics including their favorite historic opening weekend moments of the past.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
